title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 530.10 - Withdrawal of a request for review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 530.10 - Withdrawal of a request for review

State Regulations
(a) Before argument or submission, a
review shall be marked withdrawn upon receipt by the clerk of the court of a
stipulation of withdrawal signed by counsel for all parties and by petitioner
judge or justice personally. (b) After argument or submission, a
request to withdraw a review shall be supported by a stipulation of withdrawal
signed by counsel for all parties and by petitioner judge or justice
personally. The request shall be submitted to the court for
determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
530.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
